blocks.name: wtr
blocks.content: Extend wff notation to include transitive classes. Notation from [TakeutiZaring] p. 35.
blocks.origin: prop wff wtr(class c0) { Tr(c0) }

blocks.name: diff.wtr.s
diff.wtr.c
diff.wtr.w
df-tr
blocks.content: Define the transitive class predicate. Not to be confused with a transitive relation (see ~ cotr ). Definition of [Enderton] p. 71 extended to arbitrary classes. For alternate definitions, see ~ dftr2 (which is suggestive of the word "transitive"), ~ dftr3 , ~ dftr4 , ~ dftr5 , and (when ` A ` is a set) ~ unisuc . The term "complete" is used instead of "transitive" in Definition 3 of [Suppes] p. 130. (Contributed by NM, 29-Aug-1993.)

blocks.name: dftr2
blocks.content: An alternate way of defining a transitive class. Exercise 7 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 40. (Contributed by NM, 24-Apr-1994.)
blocks.origin:
thm dftr2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  |- wb(wtr(c0), wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wcel(cv(s0), c0)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  3bitr4i(wtr(c0), wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wcel(cv(s0), c0)))), wss(cuni(c0), c0), wal(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), cuni(c0)), wcel(cv(s0), c0))))
  dfss2(s0, cuni(c0), c0)
  df-tr(c0)
  albii(s0, wal(s1, wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wcel(cv(s0), c0))), wi(wcel(cv(s0), cuni(c0)), wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  bitr4i(wal(s1, wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wcel(cv(s0), c0))), wi(wcel(cv(s0), cuni(c0)), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wi(wex(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s1), c0))), wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  19.23v(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  imbi1i(wcel(cv(s0), cuni(c0)), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wex(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s1), c0))))
  eluni(s1, cv(s0), c0)
  diff.cuni.s(s0, c0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: dftr5
blocks.content: An alternate way of defining a transitive class. (Contributed by NM, 20-Mar-2004.)
blocks.origin:
thm dftr5(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  |- wb(wtr(c0), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, cv(s0), wcel(cv(s1), c0))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  bitri(wtr(c0), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, cv(s0), wcel(cv(s1), c0))), wal(s1, wal(s0, wi(wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(cv(s1), c0)))))
  dftr2(s1, s0, c0)
  bitri(wal(s1, wal(s0, wi(wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(cv(s1), c0)))), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, cv(s0), wcel(cv(s1), c0))), wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(cv(s1), c0)))))
  alcom(s1, s0, wi(wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(cv(s1), c0)))
  bitr4i(wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(cv(s1), c0)))), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, cv(s0), wcel(cv(s1), c0))), wal(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wral(s1, cv(s0), wcel(cv(s1), c0)))))
  albii(s0, wal(s1, wi(wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(cv(s1), c0))), wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wral(s1, cv(s0), wcel(cv(s1), c0))))
  bitri(wal(s1, wi(wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(cv(s1), c0))), wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wral(s1, cv(s0), wcel(cv(s1), c0))), wral(s1, cv(s0), wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c0))))
  bitr4i(wal(s1, wi(wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(cv(s1), c0))), wral(s1, cv(s0), wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c0))), wal(s1, wi(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c0)))))
  albii(s1, wi(wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wi(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c0))))
  impexp(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c0))
  df-ral(s1, cv(s0), wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c0)))
  r19.21v(s1, cv(s0), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c0))
  df-ral(s0, c0, wral(s1, cv(s0), wcel(cv(s1), c0)))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: dftr3
blocks.content: An alternate way of defining a transitive class. Definition 7.1 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 35. (Contributed by NM, 29-Aug-1993.)

blocks.name: dftr4
blocks.content: An alternate way of defining a transitive class. Definition of [Enderton] p. 71. (Contributed by NM, 29-Aug-1993.)

blocks.name: treq
blocks.content: Equality theorem for the transitive class predicate. (Contributed by NM, 17-Sep-1993.)

blocks.name: trel
blocks.content: In a transitive class, the membership relation is transitive. (Contributed by NM, 19-Apr-1994.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 9-Jul-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm trel(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wtr(c0), wi(wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c2, c0)), wcel(c1, c0)))
} = {
  sylbi(wtr(c0), wi(wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c2, c0)), wcel(c1, c0)), wal(hs0, wal(hs1, wi(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs1), c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))))
  dftr2(hs0, hs1, c0)
  pm2.43b(wal(hs0, wal(hs1, wi(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs1), c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c2, c0)), wcel(c1, c0))
  spc2gv(hs0, hs1, c1, c2, c2, c0, wi(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs1), c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wi(wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c2, c0)), wcel(c1, c0)))
  imbi12d(wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs1), c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c2, c0)), wcel(c1, c0))
  anbi12d(wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c2, c0))
  eleq12(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1), c2)
  adantl(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wceq(cv(hs1), c2), wb(wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(c2, c0)))
  eleq1(cv(hs1), c2, c0)
  adantr(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wceq(cv(hs1), c2), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(c1, c0)))
  eleq1(cv(hs0), c1, c0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wi(wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c2, c0)), wcel(c1, c0)))
  diff.hs1.w(wi(wa(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c2, c0)), wcel(c1, c0)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm trel(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (Tr(c0)→((c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c2 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈ c0))
} = {
  sylbi(Tr(c0), ((c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c2 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈ c0), ∀(hs0, ∀(hs1,((hs0 ∈ hs1 ∧ hs1 ∈ c0)→ hs0 ∈ c0))))
  dftr2(hs0, hs1, c0)
  pm2.43b(∀(hs0, ∀(hs1,((hs0 ∈ hs1 ∧ hs1 ∈ c0)→ hs0 ∈ c0))), (c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c2 ∈ c0), c1 ∈ c0)
  spc2gv(hs0, hs1, c1, c2, c2, c0, ((hs0 ∈ hs1 ∧ hs1 ∈ c0)→ hs0 ∈ c0), ((c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c2 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈ c0))
  imbi12d((hs0 = c1 ∧ hs1 = c2), (hs0 ∈ hs1 ∧ hs1 ∈ c0), hs0 ∈ c0, (c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c2 ∈ c0), c1 ∈ c0)
  anbi12d((hs0 = c1 ∧ hs1 = c2), hs0 ∈ hs1, hs1 ∈ c0, c1 ∈ c2, c2 ∈ c0)
  eleq12(hs0, c1, hs1, c2)
  adantl(hs0 = c1, hs1 = c2, (hs1 ∈ c0 ↔ c2 ∈ c0))
  eleq1(hs1, c2, c0)
  adantr(hs0 = c1, hs1 = c2, (hs0 ∈ c0 ↔ c1 ∈ c0))
  eleq1(hs0, c1, c0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(((c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c2 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈ c0))
  diff.hs1.w(((c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c2 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈ c0))
}

blocks.name: trel3
blocks.content: In a transitive class, the membership relation is transitive. (Contributed by NM, 19-Apr-1994.)

blocks.name: trss
blocks.content: An element of a transitive class is a subset of the class. (Contributed by NM, 7-Aug-1994.) (Proof shortened by JJ, 26-Jul-2021.)

blocks.name: trin
blocks.content: The intersection of transitive classes is transitive. (Contributed by NM, 9-May-1994.)
blocks.origin:
thm trin(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wtr(c0), wtr(c1)), wtr(cin(c0, c1)))
} = {
  sylibr(wa(wtr(c0), wtr(c1)), wtr(cin(c0, c1)), wral(hs0, cin(c0, c1), wss(cv(hs0), cin(c0, c1))))
  ralrimiv(hs0, cin(c0, c1), wa(wtr(c0), wtr(c1)), wss(cv(hs0), cin(c0, c1)))
  syl6ib(wa(wtr(c0), wtr(c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(c0, c1)), wss(cv(hs0), cin(c0, c1)), wa(wss(cv(hs0), c0), wss(cv(hs0), c1)))
  syl5bi(wa(wtr(c0), wtr(c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(c0, c1)), wa(wss(cv(hs0), c0), wss(cv(hs0), c1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))
  elin(cv(hs0), c0, c1)
  im2anan9(wtr(c0), wtr(c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wss(cv(hs0), c0), wss(cv(hs0), c1))
  trss(c0, cv(hs0))
  trss(c1, cv(hs0))
  ssin(cv(hs0), c0, c1)
  dftr3(hs0, cin(c0, c1))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wtr(c0), wtr(c1)))
  diff.hs0.c(cin(c0, c1))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm trin(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((Tr(c0)∧ Tr(c1))→ Tr((c0 ⋂ c1)))
} = {
  sylibr((Tr(c0)∧ Tr(c1)), Tr((c0 ⋂ c1)), ∀(hs0 ∈(c0 ⋂ c1), hs0 ⊆(c0 ⋂ c1)))
  ralrimiv(hs0, (c0 ⋂ c1), (Tr(c0)∧ Tr(c1)), hs0 ⊆(c0 ⋂ c1))
  syl6ib((Tr(c0)∧ Tr(c1)), hs0 ∈(c0 ⋂ c1), hs0 ⊆(c0 ⋂ c1), (hs0 ⊆ c0 ∧ hs0 ⊆ c1))
  syl5bi((Tr(c0)∧ Tr(c1)), hs0 ∈(c0 ⋂ c1), (hs0 ⊆ c0 ∧ hs0 ⊆ c1), (hs0 ∈ c0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c1))
  elin(hs0, c0, c1)
  im2anan9(Tr(c0), Tr(c1), hs0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ c1, hs0 ⊆ c0, hs0 ⊆ c1)
  trss(c0, hs0)
  trss(c1, hs0)
  ssin(hs0, c0, c1)
  dftr3(hs0, (c0 ⋂ c1))
  diff.hs0.w((Tr(c0)∧ Tr(c1)))
  diff.hs0.c((c0 ⋂ c1))
}

blocks.name: tr0
blocks.content: The empty set is transitive. (Contributed by NM, 16-Sep-1993.)

blocks.name: trv
blocks.content: The universe is transitive. (Contributed by NM, 14-Sep-2003.)

blocks.name: triun
blocks.content: An indexed union of a class of transitive sets is transitive. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Nov-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm triun(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wral(s0, c0, wtr(c1)), wtr(ciun(s0, c0, c1)))
} = {
  sylibr(wral(s0, c0, wtr(c1)), wtr(ciun(s0, c0, c1)), wral(hs0, ciun(s0, c0, c1), wss(cv(hs0), ciun(s0, c0, c1))))
  ralrimiva(hs0, ciun(s0, c0, c1), wral(s0, c0, wtr(c1)), wss(cv(hs0), ciun(s0, c0, c1)))
  sylan2b(wral(s0, c0, wtr(c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), ciun(s0, c0, c1)), wss(cv(hs0), ciun(s0, c0, c1)), wrex(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))
  eliun(s0, cv(hs0), c0, c1)
  syl(wa(wral(s0, c0, wtr(c1)), wrex(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1))), wss(cv(hs0), ciun(s0, c0, c1)), wrex(s0, c0, wa(wtr(c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))))
  r19.29(s0, c0, wtr(c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
  rexlimi(s0, c0, wa(wtr(c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wss(cv(hs0), ciun(s0, c0, c1)))
  nfss(s0, cv(hs0), ciun(s0, c0, c1))
  nfcv(s0, cv(hs0))
  nfiu1(s0, c0, c1)
  syl2imc(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wa(wtr(c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wss(cv(hs0), ciun(s0, c0, c1)), wss(cv(hs0), c1), wss(c1, ciun(s0, c0, c1)))
  imp(wtr(c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wss(cv(hs0), c1))
  trss(c1, cv(hs0))
  ssiun2(s0, c0, c1)
  sstr2(cv(hs0), c1, ciun(s0, c0, c1))
  dftr3(hs0, ciun(s0, c0, c1))
  diff.hs0.w(wral(s0, c0, wtr(c1)))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(ciun(s0, c0, c1))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm triun(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (∀(s0 ∈ c0, Tr(c1))→ Tr(⋃(s0 ∈ c0, c1)))
} = {
  sylibr(∀(s0 ∈ c0, Tr(c1)), Tr(⋃(s0 ∈ c0, c1)), ∀(hs0 ∈ ⋃(s0 ∈ c0, c1), hs0 ⊆ ⋃(s0 ∈ c0, c1)))
  ralrimiva(hs0, ⋃(s0 ∈ c0, c1), ∀(s0 ∈ c0, Tr(c1)), hs0 ⊆ ⋃(s0 ∈ c0, c1))
  sylan2b(∀(s0 ∈ c0, Tr(c1)), hs0 ∈ ⋃(s0 ∈ c0, c1), hs0 ⊆ ⋃(s0 ∈ c0, c1), ∃(s0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ c1))
  eliun(s0, hs0, c0, c1)
  syl((∀(s0 ∈ c0, Tr(c1))∧ ∃(s0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ c1)), hs0 ⊆ ⋃(s0 ∈ c0, c1), ∃(s0 ∈ c0,(Tr(c1)∧ hs0 ∈ c1)))
  r19.29(s0, c0, Tr(c1), hs0 ∈ c1)
  rexlimi(s0, c0, (Tr(c1)∧ hs0 ∈ c1), hs0 ⊆ ⋃(s0 ∈ c0, c1))
  nfss(s0, hs0, ⋃(s0 ∈ c0, c1))
  nfcv(s0, hs0)
  nfiu1(s0, c0, c1)
  syl2imc(s0 ∈ c0, (Tr(c1)∧ hs0 ∈ c1), hs0 ⊆ ⋃(s0 ∈ c0, c1), hs0 ⊆ c1, c1 ⊆ ⋃(s0 ∈ c0, c1))
  imp(Tr(c1), hs0 ∈ c1, hs0 ⊆ c1)
  trss(c1, hs0)
  ssiun2(s0, c0, c1)
  sstr2(hs0, c1, ⋃(s0 ∈ c0, c1))
  dftr3(hs0, ⋃(s0 ∈ c0, c1))
  diff.hs0.w(∀(s0 ∈ c0, Tr(c1)))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(⋃(s0 ∈ c0, c1))
}

blocks.name: truni
blocks.content: The union of a class of transitive sets is transitive. Exercise 5(a) of [Enderton] p. 73. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 21-Feb-2011.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 26-Apr-2014.)

blocks.name: triin
blocks.content: An indexed intersection of a class of transitive sets is transitive. (Contributed by BJ, 3-Oct-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm triin(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wral(s0, c0, wtr(c1)), wtr(ciin(s0, c0, c1)))
} = {
  sylibr(wral(s0, c0, wtr(c1)), wtr(ciin(s0, c0, c1)), wral(hs0, ciin(s0, c0, c1), wss(cv(hs0), ciin(s0, c0, c1))))
  ralrimiva(hs0, ciin(s0, c0, c1), wral(s0, c0, wtr(c1)), wss(cv(hs0), ciin(s0, c0, c1)))
  sylan2b(wral(s0, c0, wtr(c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), ciin(s0, c0, c1)), wss(cv(hs0), ciin(s0, c0, c1)), wral(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))
  elv(hs0, wb(wcel(cv(hs0), ciin(s0, c0, c1)), wral(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1))))
  eliin(s0, cv(hs0), universe, c0, c1)
  sylibr(wa(wral(s0, c0, wtr(c1)), wral(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1))), wss(cv(hs0), ciin(s0, c0, c1)), wral(s0, c0, wss(cv(hs0), c1)))
  sylbir(wa(wral(s0, c0, wtr(c1)), wral(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1))), wral(s0, c0, wss(cv(hs0), c1)), wral(s0, c0, wa(wtr(c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))))
  r19.26(s0, c0, wtr(c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
  ralimi(s0, c0, wa(wtr(c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wss(cv(hs0), c1))
  imp(wtr(c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wss(cv(hs0), c1))
  trss(c1, cv(hs0))
  ssiin(s0, cv(hs0), c0, c1)
  dftr3(hs0, ciin(s0, c0, c1))
  diff.hs0.w(wral(s0, c0, wtr(c1)))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(ciin(s0, c0, c1))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm triin(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (∀(s0 ∈ c0, Tr(c1))→ Tr(⋂(s0 ∈ c0, c1)))
} = {
  sylibr(∀(s0 ∈ c0, Tr(c1)), Tr(⋂(s0 ∈ c0, c1)), ∀(hs0 ∈ ⋂(s0 ∈ c0, c1), hs0 ⊆ ⋂(s0 ∈ c0, c1)))
  ralrimiva(hs0, ⋂(s0 ∈ c0, c1), ∀(s0 ∈ c0, Tr(c1)), hs0 ⊆ ⋂(s0 ∈ c0, c1))
  sylan2b(∀(s0 ∈ c0, Tr(c1)), hs0 ∈ ⋂(s0 ∈ c0, c1), hs0 ⊆ ⋂(s0 ∈ c0, c1), ∀(s0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ c1))
  elv(hs0, (hs0 ∈ ⋂(s0 ∈ c0, c1)↔ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ c1)))
  eliin(s0, hs0, universe, c0, c1)
  sylibr((∀(s0 ∈ c0, Tr(c1))∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ c1)), hs0 ⊆ ⋂(s0 ∈ c0, c1), ∀(s0 ∈ c0, hs0 ⊆ c1))
  sylbir((∀(s0 ∈ c0, Tr(c1))∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ c1)), ∀(s0 ∈ c0, hs0 ⊆ c1), ∀(s0 ∈ c0,(Tr(c1)∧ hs0 ∈ c1)))
  r19.26(s0, c0, Tr(c1), hs0 ∈ c1)
  ralimi(s0, c0, (Tr(c1)∧ hs0 ∈ c1), hs0 ⊆ c1)
  imp(Tr(c1), hs0 ∈ c1, hs0 ⊆ c1)
  trss(c1, hs0)
  ssiin(s0, hs0, c0, c1)
  dftr3(hs0, ⋂(s0 ∈ c0, c1))
  diff.hs0.w(∀(s0 ∈ c0, Tr(c1)))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(⋂(s0 ∈ c0, c1))
}

blocks.name: trint
blocks.content: The intersection of a class of transitive sets is transitive. Exercise 5(b) of [Enderton] p. 73. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 25-Feb-2011.) (Proof shortened by BJ, 3-Oct-2022.)

blocks.name: trintOLD
blocks.content: Obsolete proof of ~ trintOLD as of 3-Oct-2022. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 25-Feb-2011.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm trintOLD(setvar s0, class c0) {
  |- wi(wral(s0, c0, wtr(cv(s0))), wtr(cint(c0)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  sylibr(wral(s0, c0, wtr(cv(s0))), wtr(cint(c0)), wal(hs0, wi(wral(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0))), wral(s0, c0, wss(cv(hs0), cv(s0))))))
  sylg(hs0, wral(s0, c0, wtr(cv(s0))), wi(wral(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0))), wral(s0, c0, wss(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))), wral(s0, c0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wss(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))))
  sylbb(wral(s0, c0, wtr(cv(s0))), wal(hs0, wral(s0, c0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wss(cv(hs0), cv(s0))))), wral(s0, c0, wral(hs0, cv(s0), wss(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))))
  ralbii(s0, c0, wtr(cv(s0)), wral(hs0, cv(s0), wss(cv(hs0), cv(s0))))
  dftr3(hs0, cv(s0))
  bitri(wral(s0, c0, wral(hs0, cv(s0), wss(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))), wal(hs0, wral(s0, c0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wss(cv(hs0), cv(s0))))), wral(s0, c0, wal(hs0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wss(cv(hs0), cv(s0))))))
  ralbii(s0, c0, wral(hs0, cv(s0), wss(cv(hs0), cv(s0))), wal(hs0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wss(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))))
  df-ral(hs0, cv(s0), wss(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))
  ralcom4(s0, hs0, c0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wss(cv(hs0), cv(s0))))
  ralim(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wss(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))
  bitri(wtr(cint(c0)), wal(hs0, wi(wral(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0))), wral(s0, c0, wss(cv(hs0), cv(s0))))), wral(hs0, cint(c0), wss(cv(hs0), cint(c0))))
  dftr3(hs0, cint(c0))
  bitri(wral(hs0, cint(c0), wss(cv(hs0), cint(c0))), wal(hs0, wi(wral(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0))), wral(s0, c0, wss(cv(hs0), cv(s0))))), wal(hs0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cint(c0)), wss(cv(hs0), cint(c0)))))
  df-ral(hs0, cint(c0), wss(cv(hs0), cint(c0)))
  albii(hs0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cint(c0)), wss(cv(hs0), cint(c0))), wi(wral(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0))), wral(s0, c0, wss(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))))
  imbi12i(wcel(cv(hs0), cint(c0)), wss(cv(hs0), cint(c0)), wral(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0))), wral(s0, c0, wss(cv(hs0), cv(s0))))
  elint2(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  vex(hs0)
  ssint(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cv(s0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cint(c0))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm trintOLD(setvar s0, class c0) {
  ⊢ (∀(s0 ∈ c0, Tr(s0))→ Tr(⋂ c0))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
} = {
  sylibr(∀(s0 ∈ c0, Tr(s0)), Tr(⋂ c0), ∀(hs0,(∀(s0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ s0)→ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, hs0 ⊆ s0))))
  sylg(hs0, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, Tr(s0)), (∀(s0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ s0)→ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, hs0 ⊆ s0)), ∀(s0 ∈ c0,(hs0 ∈ s0 → hs0 ⊆ s0)))
  sylbb(∀(s0 ∈ c0, Tr(s0)), ∀(hs0, ∀(s0 ∈ c0,(hs0 ∈ s0 → hs0 ⊆ s0))), ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(hs0 ∈ s0, hs0 ⊆ s0)))
  ralbii(s0, c0, Tr(s0), ∀(hs0 ∈ s0, hs0 ⊆ s0))
  dftr3(hs0, s0)
  bitri(∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(hs0 ∈ s0, hs0 ⊆ s0)), ∀(hs0, ∀(s0 ∈ c0,(hs0 ∈ s0 → hs0 ⊆ s0))), ∀(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(hs0,(hs0 ∈ s0 → hs0 ⊆ s0))))
  ralbii(s0, c0, ∀(hs0 ∈ s0, hs0 ⊆ s0), ∀(hs0,(hs0 ∈ s0 → hs0 ⊆ s0)))
  df-ral(hs0, s0, hs0 ⊆ s0)
  ralcom4(s0, hs0, c0, (hs0 ∈ s0 → hs0 ⊆ s0))
  ralim(s0, c0, hs0 ∈ s0, hs0 ⊆ s0)
  bitri(Tr(⋂ c0), ∀(hs0,(∀(s0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ s0)→ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, hs0 ⊆ s0))), ∀(hs0 ∈ ⋂ c0, hs0 ⊆ ⋂ c0))
  dftr3(hs0, ⋂ c0)
  bitri(∀(hs0 ∈ ⋂ c0, hs0 ⊆ ⋂ c0), ∀(hs0,(∀(s0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ s0)→ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, hs0 ⊆ s0))), ∀(hs0,(hs0 ∈ ⋂ c0 → hs0 ⊆ ⋂ c0)))
  df-ral(hs0, ⋂ c0, hs0 ⊆ ⋂ c0)
  albii(hs0, (hs0 ∈ ⋂ c0 → hs0 ⊆ ⋂ c0), (∀(s0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ s0)→ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, hs0 ⊆ s0)))
  imbi12i(hs0 ∈ ⋂ c0, hs0 ⊆ ⋂ c0, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ s0), ∀(s0 ∈ c0, hs0 ⊆ s0))
  elint2(s0, hs0, c0)
  vex(hs0)
  ssint(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.hs0.c(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(⋂ c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: trintss
blocks.content: Any nonempty transitive class includes its intersection. Exercise 3 in [TakeutiZaring] p. 44 (which mistakenly does not include the nonemptiness hypothesis). (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 3-Mar-2011.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 14-Nov-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm trintss(class c0) {
  |- wi(wa(wtr(c0), wne(c0, emptycls)), wss(cint(c0), c0))
} = {
  impcom(wtr(c0), wne(c0, emptycls), wss(cint(c0), c0))
  sylbi(wne(c0, emptycls), wi(wtr(c0), wss(cint(c0), c0)), wex(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  n0(hs0, c0)
  exlimiv(hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wi(wtr(c0), wss(cint(c0), c0)))
  sylsyld(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wtr(c0), wss(cint(c0), c0), wss(cint(c0), cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c0))
  intss1(cv(hs0), c0)
  com12(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wtr(c0), wss(cv(hs0), c0))
  trss(c0, cv(hs0))
  sstr2(cint(c0), cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wi(wtr(c0), wss(cint(c0), c0)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm trintss(class c0) {
  ⊢ ((Tr(c0)∧ c0 ≠ ∅)→ ⋂ c0 ⊆ c0)
} = {
  impcom(Tr(c0), c0 ≠ ∅, ⋂ c0 ⊆ c0)
  sylbi(c0 ≠ ∅, (Tr(c0)→ ⋂ c0 ⊆ c0), ∃(hs0, hs0 ∈ c0))
  n0(hs0, c0)
  exlimiv(hs0, hs0 ∈ c0, (Tr(c0)→ ⋂ c0 ⊆ c0))
  sylsyld(hs0 ∈ c0, Tr(c0), ⋂ c0 ⊆ c0, ⋂ c0 ⊆ hs0, hs0 ⊆ c0)
  intss1(hs0, c0)
  com12(hs0 ∈ c0, Tr(c0), hs0 ⊆ c0)
  trss(c0, hs0)
  sstr2(⋂ c0, hs0, c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w((Tr(c0)→ ⋂ c0 ⊆ c0))
}
